creator: William O’Neil India
descriptionHtml:
SwingTrader India applies the rules of CAN SLIM Investing System, propounded by our Founder William J. O'Neil in a swing trading environment to help you take advantage of short term trends.

Unlike other swing trade products, SwingTrader India combines fundamental analysis with technical analysis to increase your potential for success.

We go for quick hits. Most trades will last 15 — 20 days. In a strong market the profit goal is about 7% on the upside with a stop loss around 3%. SwingTrader India is nimble, so the goals are quickly adjusted to fit the character of the market. The strategy is simple: go for base hits. A lot of small gains can add up to big profits.

One Simple List: The current trades list prioritizes stocks that are currently in a buy zone. Then, you’ll see stocks that have already triggered a buy point or are waiting to enter a buy zone.

Easy-to-Read Charts: SwingTrader India charts show you the trade setup visually and give you more detailed information.

Trade Setup: For each trade you’ll get a quick overview including Trade Setup, Buy Zone, Profit Goal and Stop Loss.

Past Trades
Once a trade is closed by a stock reaching the profit goal, flashing a sell signal or hitting the stop loss, the stock moves to the past trades section. You get a snapshot of each closed trade and this list is easy to sort and search.

Market Analysis
The market analysis in SwingTrader India is unique and tailored for a swing trading environment, so it might be different from the analysis in other William O'Neil India products you may use.

Swing Trading
Learn more about swing trading strategies & get the latest action from the SwingTrader India team.

Alerts to Keep You Current

Emails
Since swing trading moves fast, your subscription includes email alerts and notifications to keep you up to speed on the action. You will receive the emails automatically.

Notifications
You’ll be prompted to sign up for notifications the first time you log on to SwingTrader. The notifications will appear on your desktop and laptop.

Our Team
Our team is focused on one priority: helping you make more money in the stock market. The SwingTrader India team is comprised of market experts with more than 50 years combined experience using the CAN SLIM Investing System. They use over 20 proprietary screens that scan for key fundamental and technical criteria to develop swing trade ideas.
descriptionShort: SWINGTrader India applies CAN SLIM rules to take advantage of short term trends

TraderSmith applies the rules of CAN SLIM Investing System, propounded by our Founder William J. O'Neil in a swing trading environment to help you take advantage of short term trends.


Unlike other swing trade products, TraderSmith combines fundamental analysis with technical analysis to increase your potential for success.


We go for quick hits. Most trades will last 15 — 20 days. In a strong market the profit goal is about 7% on the upside with a stop loss of around 3%. TraderSmith is nimble, so the goals are quickly adjusted to fit the character of the market. The strategy is simple: go for base hits. A lot of small gains can add up to big profits.



One Simple List: The current trades list prioritizes stocks that are currently in a buy zone. Then, you’ll see stocks that have already triggered a buy point or are waiting to enter a buy zone.

Easy-to-Read Charts: TraderSmith charts show you the trade setup visually and give you more detailed information.


Trade Setup: For each trade you’ll get a quick overview including Trade Setup, Buy Zone, Profit Goal and Stop Loss.


Past Trades

Once a trade is closed by a stock reaching the profit goal, flashing a sell signal or hitting the stop loss, the stock moves to the past trades section. You get a snapshot of each closed trade and this list is easy to sort and search.



Market Analysis

The market analysis in TraderSmith is unique and tailored for a swing trading environment, so it might be different from the analysis in other William O'Neil India products you may use.



Swing Trading

Learn more about swing trading strategies & get the latest action from the TraderSmith team.

Alerts to Keep You Updated

Emails

Since swing trading moves fast, your subscription includes email alerts and notifications to keep you up to speed on the action. You will receive the emails automatically.

Notifications

You’ll be prompted to sign up for notifications the first time you log on to TraderSmith. The notifications will appear on your desktop and laptop.



Our Team

Our team’s sole priority is to help you make more money in the stock market. The TraderSmith team is comprised of market experts with more than 50 years combined experience using the CAN SLIM Investing System. They use over 20 proprietary screens that scan for key fundamental and technical criteria to develop swing trade ideas.
descriptionShort: TraderSmith India applies CAN SLIM rules to take advantage of short term trends

creator: William O’Neil India
descriptionHtml:
TraderSmith applies the rules of CAN SLIM Investing System, propounded by our Founder William J. O'Neil in a swing trading environment to help you take advantage of short term trends.


Unlike other swing trade products, TraderSmith combines fundamental analysis with technical analysis to increase your potential for success.


We go for quick hits. Most trades will last 15 — 20 days. In a strong market the profit goal is about 7% on the upside with a stop loss of around 3%. TraderSmith is nimble, so the goals are quickly adjusted to fit the character of the market. The strategy is simple: go for base hits. A lot of small gains can add up to big profits.



One Simple List: The current trades list prioritizes stocks that are currently in a buy zone. Then, you’ll see stocks that have already triggered a buy point or are waiting to enter a buy zone.

Easy-to-Read Charts: TraderSmith charts show you the trade setup visually and give you more detailed information.


Trade Setup: For each trade you’ll get a quick overview including Trade Setup, Buy Zone, Profit Goal and Stop Loss.


Past Trades

Once a trade is closed by a stock reaching the profit goal, flashing a sell signal or hitting the stop loss, the stock moves to the past trades section. You get a snapshot of each closed trade and this list is easy to sort and search.



Market Analysis

The market analysis in TraderSmith is unique and tailored for a swing trading environment, so it might be different from the analysis in other William O'Neil India products you may use.



Swing Trading

Learn more about swing trading strategies & get the latest action from the TraderSmith team.

Alerts to Keep You Updated

Emails

Since swing trading moves fast, your subscription includes email alerts and notifications to keep you up to speed on the action. You will receive the emails automatically.

Notifications

You’ll be prompted to sign up for notifications the first time you log on to TraderSmith. The notifications will appear on your desktop and laptop.



Our Team

Our team’s sole priority is to help you make more money in the stock market. The TraderSmith team is comprised of market experts with more than 50 years combined experience using the CAN SLIM Investing System. They use over 20 proprietary screens that scan for key fundamental and technical criteria to develop swing trade ideas.
